text:
@PMOIndia @narendramodi sir you done your best but please make decision to lift nationwide Lockdown, we can not follow Lockdown further may 17, in  motherland India may be we don't die due coronavirus but we will surely die due to starvation, unemployment and loan repayment stress.  
#nomorelockdown https://t.co/oxzyv66amJ
